txt.en: 'Well done my friends. You make quicker work of these drakes than I had anticipated.'

You must drive away the wing of drakes that have descended upon the Elf-ruins of Pembar from the peak of Zirakzigil. Should you succeed, you will have the blessings of the Elves to make use of the ancient forge within the ruins to empower the infused garnet you bear.
You have created an empowered garnet!
'When you are done with the forge, I can take you back to Echad Dúnann.'
'I daresay what few drakes remain of this flight will not stray far from the peaks of Zirakzigil for some time after this stinging defeat.'
Hunt down the younger drakes while avoiding their elder brethren.
'Are you ready to return to Echad Dúnann?'
The enraged Wing-mother has descended into the courtyard in the centre of the ruins. Confront and defeat her to drive the drakes from the ruins for good.
Use the ancient forge to empower your imbued garnet.
Speak with Perimbant to return to Echad Dúnann.
